website_summaries.verdict: The Sperry Crest Vibe exhibits that tried-and-tested silhouettes need not much changing. Crafting each detail to perfection and ensuring that each material is of premium quality, these sneakers show that it's a canvas sneaker that stands out above the rest.Offered at an affordable price, users can get the worth of these given its flexible style, durability, and all-day comfort.
pros: A high number of consumers describe the Sperry Crest Vibe as superbly comfortable
Moreover, those who were able to wear these for the whole day did not encounter issues
Many express their high appreciation for the versatile style of this sneaker
A couple of wearers give notice on the breathable material of the upper
Because of the satisfaction of many with the Crest Vibe of the Sperry brand, adding in more colors in their collection becomes an urge that needs to be gratified
A self-confessed clumsy girl feels surprised that she hasn't slipped from wearing these sneakers
A significant amount of users certainly recommends these shoes
Aside from the many features that it comes with, each detail stands out, and the materials used are of good quality, a few commenters have said
A small percentage of wearers commend the brand for offering wide width options
The convenience of not needing to bend down to lace these is highly enjoyed by an online consumer
A user who is self-conscious about her wide feet loves that it makes the illusion of a narrow foot
cons: Some users find the Sperry Crest Vibe a tad narrow
Quite a number of testers give comments that these have caused blisters upon initial wear
Satisfied with the performance of this canvas sneaker, a couple of buyers have shared that creating a leather option is something that might make sense as well

customer_reviews.title: Laces stained when they got wet
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to wear my new sneakers. I worn them once and it started to rain while we were out. I was extreme displeased to see that laces had ran color and stained the shoe. Edit... contacted Sperry directly about the issue and they they sending me a new pair for free so 5 stars for customer service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and look awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding sneakers I like because I like ones that are really low around the ankles. These are perfect! I'm going to be buying some other pairs in different colors. I got grey because it would go with more of my clothes colors as I tried them out. Definitely gotta get black and white pairs and maybe one or two other colors. So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: reignbough1973

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute but Waaay Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 7M but purchased these in 7 1/2. They are so tight I could barely get my foot in and they hurt all over. I am very disappointed because they are really attractive. I definitely will try them on if I see them in a store, but I have never bought an 8 or 8 1/2 in any shoe before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes so much I ordered a second pair when I saw them on Amazon. They are sporty, but don’t look too old or young. Love the laces. They have a padded footbed for added comfort
customer_reviews.author: Pennsylvania Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 in any shoe, but was concerned about these being narrow. I have wide feet. So, I got a 10. Glad I did. They fit perfect. Not to tight. I contiplated giving 4 stars just because they are super flat! No arch support at all. I purchased orthotics and that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes overall look so good. I may be returning because they are smaller than I expected and I feel they may end up blistering my feet. I don't have fat feet I just think the. Ext size up would have been better
customer_reviews.author: GRuocco

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size, cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Saw these in a store but they didn't have my size so I checked Amazon! BINGO! My feet are a bit wide but not enough to buy shoes in wide and these fit nicely. Wore them all day the first day with no issues (and no socks). My 12 year old wants a pair now because they are "so cute!"
customer_reviews.author: RKline

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker heaven
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Great Sperry sneakers, quality and design never fails! These shoes are immediately comfortable and on-style. They are light weight and proportioned nicely, and just look and feel like you could live in them every day :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Barbour

customer_reviews.title: This shoes very comfortable and very well made
customer_reviews.text: This shoes very comfortable and very well made! I'm sometimes between a 9.5-10 (26.5 cm), and ordered 10, but they run a little large. 9.5 would be better for me. Overall these shoes are great
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy them in every color if I could!
customer_reviews.text: I have this sneaker in 2 colors and absolutely love it. I get a lot of compliments on them but even more importantly they are the most comfortable sneakers I have ever owned. The memory foam insoles make it feel like you are wearing slippers. Yes, your feet are that comfortable! The only problem I sometimes have is that the elastic strap across the top of the foot gets a little tight if my feet swell. I stand on my feet a good part of the day so that sometimes happens. I love the way that the rawhide laces are coiled into a knot instead of tied in a bow.
customer_reviews.author: Glamazon23

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! Straight out of the box I wore them shopping for a few hours and absolutely no breaking in pain. They are so comfortable! They’re also incredibly cute and look great with just about any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Florida winter shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love love Sperry!! These are my winter shoes as we live in Florida and it never really gets that cold. They were a bit tight when I got them but I have been able to wear them in. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: T&L Gardner

customer_reviews.title: A little big but comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and very comfy, I'm on my feet a lot at work. No support in the arch if you need that but you could easily put an insert in. My only complaint is they fit just a little big. I almost always wear 8 in different brands and these feel a little loose but not enough that I want to return and size down.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Juden

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews!!! Sperry is a great company and make quality shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them!!! I read all the reviews which helped me decide whether to get these shoes. I love the Oat color that I chose and the leather shoe strings which Sperry is known for gives them the Wow factor!!! The size was perfect and so comfortable, hopefully I can buy in different colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, easy to slip on, easy to clean with damp cloth, has kept their shape for several months of constant wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Not great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They run a bit large. They have NO support. I was expecting something better for the price. They are cute, but if you have a high instep, they are not the shoes for you. They are VERY flat. I can wear them to the store, but that is about it. I plan to return them. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful boat shoes. Comfy, cute and functional on a sailboat. I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to having a pair of these. Unfortunately the shoe looked slightly worn with animal hair in the shoe and the laces had been completely undone which I did not know how to re-tie them the way they were originally intended to be tied. Overall was disappointed but was refunded my money so it wasn’t a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was very cute and stylish but the material that it is made with was very stiff and uncomfortable so much so that it actually hurt to try them on. I then tried them with a sock but that didn’t help either. I returned them, I have not been refunded yet. This is not normal with Amazon. Obviously it’s the company they came from that is the hold up. They were slow shipping them out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Donlysol

customer_reviews.title: Classy, cute and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is very cute. I usually wear 7.5M because my feet are slightly wide. This one, I ordered in 8M and it fits just fine. I wore them with a navy striped top and white jeans and the whole outfit looked so cute. These are so versatile that it would go with practically everything. Recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Arones

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I have another pair of Sperry's (pier views) that I'm not so wild about but these are perfect. They are comfortable, fit true to size and are very cute. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: E. Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: What a joke, this isn’t the first time I’ve got a pair of shoes off amazon and for some mysterious reason the label has been tampered with to say the size the box is, but it in no way shape or form is. Nice try. Sent back! Ordered an 11 and they were at least a size 12. Did they think I wouldn’t notice lol
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I usually wear a 9.5 and bought a 9.5. They do have a little bit of wiggle room but I find that this quality makes them more comfortable. I’m a teacher and on my feet most of the day and so far, so good with comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a mother’s day gift for my mom, she loves them! Her face lit up so fast when she opened the box. She also looks so cute in them! Love these shoes. She says they’re comfy but will leave blisters without socks on (as any new shoe would) Other than that they are super comfortable to wear for a long period of time and now she wants more! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Very cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Fit is a little snug if wearing more than thin socks. But perfect for what I wanted. I wear with no show socks. I am usually an 8.5 to 9. Bought these in 8.5 knowing I would wear with thin socks. Support is not great but that is to be expected with this type of shoe. Being in my mid-50’s I would probably not wear these to walk in all day. Still very happy wit my purchase and might even get in another color. I bought in black.
customer_reviews.author: BlondZombie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sperry’s. Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely don’t know how anyone can’t love Sperry’s. These are the most wonderful, well fitting shoes. I have a narrow foot for being as tall and older, so the medium width is still amazing. No one wants tight shoes. I was looking for a white tennis shoe, but not a tennis shoe. These are perfect. They are so fresh, adorable, comfortable, and they now say they have memory foam. Fantastic. Highly recommend this brand, this shoe and any in the Sperry line.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of shoes right now. Easy slip on and take off. I get complimented on these often. They fit as expected, my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this sneaker looks and feel. Because of the linen material you can wear it without looking too sporty or informal. I’m usually an 8.5 or 9, and I ordered the 9 and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Can dress up or down and I love the knots in the end of the laces, also got them In gray. It says linen, but the fabric was more canvas like and I loved that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if these were Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I'm not positive if these were Authentic. I've tried on a few different pairs at various times in Nordstrom Rack. But never bought them because the colors weren't what I was looking for. When I found these, they were exactly what Inwas looking for. However when I tried them on they lacked all of the cushion that I'd experienced when I'd tried on different pairs. So I'm questioning their authenticity...
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: All-day comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are more comfortable than expected. The footbed is fairly thick and insulating. The laces work great-- just tighten laces in eyelets, then twist the curley end of the leather lace underneath the opposite lace-- easy-peasy no-tie and bow. The linen color is beachy and casual. Hope there's a sale on the other colors. Plan to buy more of these all-day comfort shoes.
customer_reviews.author: TrykaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 5th pair of Sperry Top-Sider Sneakers, my go-to brand, and they did not disappoint! Only brand I've worn in 4 years! This was a slightly different styling, and as cute and comfortable as my others! SO pleased!
customer_reviews.author: SH1860

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first, but comfortable once you break in
customer_reviews.text: Shoe seems true to size. I usually wear 9.5, sometimes a 9. I bought size 9.5. The shoe was tight at first. The laces are tied in and I couldn't untie them to make it a little looser. I was able to get the shoe on, and I did get a blister on the back of my foot the first day I wore them (this tends to happen with a lot of shoes I buy until I break them in). Once I broke them in, the shoe fits much better, but it took about a week of wearing them to get them broken in. Seems more comfortable now. Hoping they last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Simple, casual, comfy shoe. I ordered a 9.5 which is a half size up from what I normally wear in a Sperry shoe because of some of the reviews said size up. I have a little bit too much room but not bad enough to send back, lol, so I'm wearing them. They are super cute and I love them. If I order these again I'm going to stick to ordering a size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Sperry shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid shoe, comfortable, stylish. Feels as tight as a regular sneaker but it is nice to not have to lace them on and off. A good product at a good price. Sperry's are one of my favorite brands.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for casual days
customer_reviews.text: Goes with everything. No break in time needed. Walked around all day at Disney (open to close) without any issues
customer_reviews.author: Poohie2003

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, no arch support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really cute! But they do run narrow and they have no arch support. But indeed they are a cute shoe
customer_reviews.author: A.T.R

customer_reviews.title: Absoulely Love them
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable and do run a little bit bigger , but fits good on my feet. I ordered an 8 1/2, but you will need to judge with what you think will feel comfortable on your feet. I received so many compliments on how cute they look, and had family and friends go purchase them on Amazon. Highly recommend ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: The arch support is not good for those of us who have plantar faciitis. Was disappointed as when reading and looking at pictures it seemed to have a good arch support but it doesn't. I only wear the pair I kept for a very short period of time so that my foot doesn't start to hurt. They fit great but did order as recommended a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: They are a little short. But I am keeping them, as I expect a half size up might be too big. M is plenty wide and not too narrow. I don't normally wear perfectly flat shoes, so I hope that does not cause a problem. I wasn't sure that there was any arch support, but I can feel it in the insole.
customer_reviews.author: silkysmom

customer_reviews.title: Different colors fit differently
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Oat color size 11, they were snug, but easy enough to slip on. A couple weeks later I purchased a black pair, same size. It took a lot of effort to get them on. It’s almost like they are a different brand. I am determined to stretch them out a little so it’s not such a chore to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Drake

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in lack of arch support
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the typical sperry arch support which is why I chose to buy them over Vans. They are very cute and versatile though!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoes, Great for Summer!
customer_reviews.text: Love Sperry shoes! These are cute, color was perfect - navy, they go with almost anything, great for casual wear. Not much in way of arch support but are still comfortable, great shoes for everyday wear. Would purchase again. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: NicatNite

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes for any time of the year. Glad them had the option of wide width because my feet are very wide and I have trouble finding shoes to fit. And although I do wish they were even just a bit wider, they are great and will work! Easy to style, comfortable and cute! Wish I could get more colors, but they're out of my size.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love The Shoe! Arrived Promptly!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these online various places, thought they were so cute...but know my fussy feet. Happened to find them at Macy's for $29.99 and ordered a gray pair. Loved them, and of course, sizes were gone when I went back for more. Found them here, on Amazon, for a reasonable cost. Bought. Just as delighted with the navy pair as the gray. I haven't walked far in them, and my feet are more problematic at a distance. They have been great thus far, however, and I have received lots of compliments. Would purchase again. Look around for the best deal...
customer_reviews.author: Peggy H.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these as the stitching on the heal had imperfections and caused an immediate blister.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mock

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes were great and comfortable. Unfortunately 3 months later, the sole separated from the shoe. Cheap cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Happiness at last!!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved and suffered with my Sperry's for years as the style I like didn't come in wide with and I wore them anyway. Finally, I have a wide width that fits perfectly. Actually, I was able to go down half a size. Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Judie Bouldry

customer_reviews.title: These are a basic for me, usually.
customer_reviews.text: I order a pair of these almost every year - so it's weird that these don't fit. They are long and wide. I always wear a 10, and these were huge! Downsized to 9.5 and still too big. Don't know what's going on, but they are going back. Going to miss them.....
customer_reviews.author: ckgreenthumb

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok. Not very comfortable and the very round toe is not very flattering on an adult woman. I do love the color, a light periwinkle blue shade.
customer_reviews.author: DeAquitaine

customer_reviews.title: The smell is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The glue odor make them unwearable! They are very heavy and don’t seem to feel or look like any of my other Sperry’s.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bullock

customer_reviews.title: These run just a bit roomy:
customer_reviews.text: An 8 1/2 is usually just right to snug for me but my feet move around a little in these Vibes since I am going no socks in them. They are very cute in my opinion, and I would recommend them as a casual fashion accessory since there's not enough support to do much walking - as I knew going in. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great slip-ons
customer_reviews.text: I have sort of small, but very wide feet. I usually order half a size bigger than usual if the shoe isn't available in wide, which is how I ordered these, and they are very tight. But the practicality and memory foam foot bed made me keep them. But beware of pinch to all the other wide footed ladies out there.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Therapist
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for “casual day” at my job. I am an OT so I do a ton of walking around and am always on my feet. The first day they were a little rough on the heels but with a few bandaids I was fine and then I had no issues after that! Worn them about 5 times and they fit and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Sig

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I wanted something easy to slip on and off. I love the neutral color. They are a little wide but that's okay. I'm still able to wear them comfortably for hours. No blisters. I plan on buying another pair in a different color. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Em807

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. I was worried that it will be too loud but it's perfect. It's more of a neutral color that goes well with almost any color. I get a lot of compliments when wearing it. One gripe though is the memory foam insole. I don't know if it's just my imagination, but the memory foam insole seems to be thinner compared to my other Sperry sneakers. With my other Sperry sneakers, I can last a day without getting too tired because of the comfortable insoles but it's not the case with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect NAVY Canvas Classy Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I really like these navy canvas sneakers, they look a more classy than your tie up canvas and feel they can be worn with more outfits, so comfortable and look and feel great. A little spendy and I had to think about it before biting the bullet on these but glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: DjW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant after reading several reviews about needing to break them in before reaching comfort. I was in need of replacing a similar pair that I have worn for a couple of years similar but not the exact style. I have worn them once and found them to be what I needed. My others were linen and oatmeal color, however, although they claimed to be linen but they look like a light tan canvas. I am sure I will be wearing them during my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Klose

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of memory foam in these Sperry's! I wear them all the time and they are comfortable and attractive. Worth the price for the amount that I wear them. And the canvas doesn't stretch out so much that they slide off, they are just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great shoe. Not the most supportive, but so cute with shorts, jeans, leggings. I sprayed them with scotchguard and waterproofed to keep them nice as long as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Saharri6

customer_reviews.title: Yea for Wide, Boo for cushion
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Usually can’t wear Sperry sneakers bc they don’t usually come in wide and I have a bunion. Also have back problems and the cushioning/support is insufficient for that. So I bought them in wide. Bonus is that the insert is removable (unlike most Sperrys), so I replaced it with a better insert. Yes, that made them twice as expensive. If you don’t have foot or back problems, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes !
customer_reviews.text: Love sperry shoes ,,, so does my dog , he ate my favorite pair , but fortunately I was able to order the exact same size , style and color .... these shoes are stylish and comfortable !!
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely true to size. I read other reviews that said to size up a half size. I wish I had stayed true to my normal size. Great quality shoe and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is a little narrow for normal feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were longer and slimmer than what I expected. I normally don't have to order wide shoes, but I would need to if I want to order these again. The size is bigger than other brands I order, but also more narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I have the same size in another color bought from Dillard’s and the fit is true to size and fits well .. this size is too big and slips at my heel .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for the high arch support.
customer_reviews.text: These have a high arch support and fit my foot well. I wore them to work all day with no achy knees and hips afterwards. They're comfortable and don't slip on smooth tile. I applied them with a waterproofing and KIWI stain resistant spray. Very happy with my purchase. My order was received as expected - in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Garthus

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and fit of the shoe. The only reason that I gave it a 3 star rating is because there is no arch support and can't wear them if doing a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: lesa h

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to shoe when I can’t wear flip flops
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I needed a “winter” alternative to flip flops to wear around town with my yoga pants or casual black pants- these are perfect. I wear with no-show socks and they are too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are extremely comfortable and fashionable. Easy to clean. There's a reason this brand is popular - was very happy I could buy them on Amazon. Could not find them in my size in multiple retail stores and it came in just on time for my vacation. Want other pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_MC

customer_reviews.title: Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! They have more “give” than the leather ones, so they fit well when worn in and walking. The leather slip. These are so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Donavan Grey

customer_reviews.title: cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: you know how shoes rub on your achilles and makes your skin raw? these don't do that. wear with or without socks and its fine. I love these shoes, I want more
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Grace

customer_reviews.title: Extra style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love how high end these particular sperrys look! I have 3 other colors in this style, however my others don't have the added stitch around the toe. Super comfortable and stylish! Color goes with everything; shorts, skirts, pants and dresses!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love theses little sneakes . They are perfect for my needs and so adorable . They are memory foam so the are pretty comfy however haven't had them on very long distance to really test that . For the price they are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped very quickly. Perfect condition. Cute spiral she laces that don’t tie. Easy to slip on and off. Stylish to wear.
customer_reviews.author: carmster

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these shoes. After buying these I gave purchased 6 more (in different colors). They fit perfect and are absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: babygirl89

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and stylish. I would have kept them, but too tight for my hard to fit feet.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Fassbender

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These Shoes are easy to slip off and on during the Spring and Summer months. Great for just about anything!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney S. Sheblessy

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty side feet so picky a comfy cute shoe is difficult but these are amazing!! Got the 8 wide sneaker and wear them almost everyday!! Super cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Edward R Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Great look, comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of these shoes. So versatile. They were comfortable the first day I wore them and never rubbed or irritated.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: pretty disappointed. Picture doesn't really do the discoloration justice ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had these shoes for a short while and they got wet and the laces stained the shoes. Similar to another review, pretty disappointed. Picture doesn't really do the discoloration justice but they look old and worn now
customer_reviews.author: Erin Levenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Sperry style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits great and the mem foam makes them extra comfy. Not a lot of arch support but the style is perfect for shorts, capris or a sporty little dress! <3
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good boating shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks. I use them for boating. I wear a size 7 in a flat shoe and they are just right but a little short with a sock.
customer_reviews.author: P Swartout

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I love Sperrys, but I literally made it down a hallway before I had to take these off and find different shoes to wear because they were ripping up my ankles. It may have been because they were too large, but even then the material is so stiff and rough that I think even the right size would hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Julija

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and don't give blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I wear Sperry tennis shoes all the time and these are super comfortable and look really cute! I cut the elastic on all of these shoes I buy because I have high arches. It's a standard when I buy these shoes from Sperry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to have to replace them
customer_reviews.text: oh man these are my all time favorite and go to pair of shoes! I hope they last because I don't ever want to replace them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but got blisters in heel.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is fairly true to size, however, it rubs on the back and gave me blisters on heels of both feet. This style of shoe is not typically one you would wear socks with and I was pretty bummed that they hurt even though they’re so cute. I’ll try breaking them in more with socks on and hopefully can wear in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ryan rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Good casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Tight for wide feet but works. Easy to get scuff marks on fabric material but these are SO cute! Absolutely love this style!
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE COLOR
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why mine are not a true white. I saw them at Nordstrom Rack and loved them but they didn’t have my size. So I decided to buy them here but when I received them they were not like the ones I saw. This definitely have a cream-beige color and I’m so disappointed since I was so excited to wear them
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe! Comfortable! Fits great. True to size. First time wearing them felt like an old favorite! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lynn F. Osterhout

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes.. these are my second pair.. I will be getting more.. Super comfortable.. I am on my feet all day at work.. and with these on no problem with that 8 hour shift
customer_reviews.author: Tracey calderon

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfortable, and look classic. Got compliments on these from day one. I might add an insole for my arches, but only because I'm up and moving around a lot during the day.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable right out of the box. Got a blister after I walked a lot in the shoes, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! The size was accurate as I normally wear 7-7.5 and ordered a seven and it fits perfectly. It's also a really cute shoe and goes great with skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit perfectly & are true to size. First time wearing them, I went shopping & my feet were happy at the end of the day!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair about 3 years ago. I had worn them out. This pair is a little different but very comfortable! I wear them several days each week
customer_reviews.author: Carrol D. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM! They’re so comfy! Exactly what I wanted and I even just purchased the white pair too!
customer_reviews.author: Dinah

customer_reviews.title: Very chic shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and they look really nice on her. She hasn’t complained about them hurting her feet so I’m thinking they’re good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DMM19

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip on tennies
customer_reviews.text: I have these in pink, black and gray. I love them. They are so cute, comfortable. I wear a size nine and the nine fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DakotaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Everyday shoes perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice-looking, comfortable sneakers fits my wide feet. I ordered both colors and am happy with their stylish looks.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip on go to shoe
customer_reviews.text: Look adorable, stylish and cute! I have a wider foot and for just right. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D.

product_meta.title: Sperry Top-Sider Women's Crest Vibe Sneaker
feature_bullets: Durable sneaker construction securely bonds upper to rubber outsole
Elastic back for a secure, slip-on fit
Removable footbed for lightweight comfort and arch support
